title: Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2021-36828 WP Maintenance plugin for WordPress Vulnerability

titles: Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2021-36828 WP Maintenance plugin for WordPress Vulnerability

sentences: WP Maintenance plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability using to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victims Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victims cookie-based authentication credentials.
